planets.title: School

planets.long: Here's a detailed look at my academic journey — courses like Data Structures, ML, Systems, and more!

planets.name: Planet AI
planets.title: CorrBot
planets.long: This project fine-tuned a personalized chatbot on my own messages using LLaMA 3 and QLoRA.

planets.name: Planet Research
planets.title: ThinkEval
planets.long: This benchmark evaluated reasoning capabilities using daily puzzles and transformer models.

planets.name: Planet Gaming
planets.title: Studemon
planets.long: Built a flashcard app with Pygame where you battle using quiz knowledge — inspired by Pokémon.

planets.name: Planet Creative

planets.long: I create both 2D/3D art and turn them into game assets and UI mockups for indie game projects
